p: All eastern redcedar saplings were of similar size when purchased from Pineland's Nursery in Columbus, New Jersey and were about 18 months old. Mean initial heights of eastern redcedars ± S.E. at the start of the experiment on 23 June 2016 were 138.4 ± 2.54 mm, and mean initial stem diameters ± S.E. were 2.6 ± 0.06 mm.
